headline: Is the AI bubble helping or hurting software’s outlook for 2026?
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets wrapped up a weeklong European marketing tour that spanned seven cities and nearly fifty client meetings, giving the bank a clear view of how investors are thinking about software heading into 2026.

content.title: Is the AI bubble helping or hurting software’s outlook for 2026?

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Salesforce’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Salesforce’s third quarter results drew a positive market response, with management crediting strong adoption of its AI-driven AgentForce platform and robust execution across core segments. CEO Marc Benioff highlighted that AgentForce ARR reached about $540 million, up 330% year over year, and emphasized that customer demand for AI-powered solutions is accelerating, especially as enterprises seek to integrate automation with their existing workflows.
